pli-tv-pvr11:48.1_0: (4a) Are there disputes that are a legal issue arising from a dispute? Are there disputes that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not a dispute? Are there legal issues that are also a dispute?
pli-tv-pvr11:48.2_0: There may be disputes that are a legal issue arising from a dispute; there may be disputes that are not a legal issue; there may legal issues that are not a dispute; there may be legal issues that are also a dispute.
pli-tv-pvr11:49.1_0: How is there a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute?
pli-tv-pvr11:49.2_0: It’s when the monks are disputing: ‘This is the teaching.’
pli-tv-pvr11:49.4_0: In regard to this, whatever there is of quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife—
pli-tv-pvr11:49.5_0: this is a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr11:50.1_0: How is there a dispute that is not a legal issue?
pli-tv-pvr11:50.2_0: A mother disputes with her child; a child with their mother; a father with his child; a child with their father; a brother with his brother; a brother with his sister; a sister with her brother; a friend with their friend—
pli-tv-pvr11:50.3_0: this is a dispute that is not a legal issue.
pli-tv-pvr11:51.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is not a dispute?
pli-tv-pvr11:51.2_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business—
pli-tv-pvr11:51.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not a dispute.
pli-tv-pvr11:52.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is also a dispute?
pli-tv-pvr11:52.2_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is a legal issue and also a dispute.
pli-tv-pvr11:53.1_0: (4b) Are there accusations that are a legal issue arising from an accusation? Are there accusations that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not an accusation? Are there legal issues that are also an accusation?

pli-tv-pvr11:54.2_0: It’s when the monks accuse a monk of failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.

pli-tv-pvr11:56.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr11:57.2_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is a legal issue and also an accusation.
